entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pangnirtung
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:57 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pangnirtung Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:53 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:53 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
